title: Precious Forked Root Specimen
name: Ginseng Root
description: A pale root with a distinctive forked, human-like shape. Unusual appearance. Very expensive-looking.
purpose: Original ingredient in Sebastian's harmless elixir
reveals: Alchemical 'binding' agent with mystical significance. Symbolic rather than pharmacologically significant. Shows Sebastian's romantic, mystical approach to the formula.

character_interpretations.professor: Ginseng root—precious, difficult to source, very expensive. The fact that this is here shows significant botanical knowledge and considerable expense. Not someone casually dabbling in herbalism.
character_interpretations.baker: I don't recognize this root. The shape is strange—looks like it has limbs. Very unusual and ritualistically prepared. Out of my knowledge.
character_interpretations.heiress: I don't spend time examining curiosities in abandoned garages.
character_interpretations.explorer: A genuine ginseng root. Very difficult to cultivate and expensive. Only serious practitioners would source this. Someone went to significant effort and considerable expense.
character_interpretations.fiduciary: Ginseng root. Prized in Eastern traditions and magical practices. Completely harmless. But its presence is unusual and costly.
